Description: A: Fragment of a spacer-bead, three segments preserved, one of them slightly broken off, made of reddish faience. B: Fragment of a segmented cylindrical bead made of whitish faience.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E12.4A, stone of north door
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
